TopicTitle: Music Video - Beethoven's 5th Symphony - 7 Minutes of Euphoria!!!

Articles.Content:
Over 10 hours of epic KSP gameplay, packed into 7 minutes of pure euphoria!

\/ \/ \/ \/ \/

http://youtu.be/WQ8kH8OqI8Y

/\ /\ /\ /\ /\

Rocket ships, space planes, explosions, crashes, risky landings, docking, space shuttles,...

Thanks! It was a lot of hard work. Very difficult to combine the emotions from the music with the gameplay. I ended up trying to visualize what the conductor would of been doing with his hands, and it helped.
